message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you consider $10,500?
I understand your position, but $10,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
